Notes: Akrotiri and Dhekelia are classed together as Sovereign Base Areas.

Name for Citizen: Inapplicable: no indigenous or permanent resident population
Notes: The British Antarctic Territory consists of all land, islands and ice shelves south of latitude 60°S between longitude 20°W and 80°W.
The British Indian Ocean Territory consists of the Chagos Archipelago, including Diego Garcia.

It is important not to confuse the British Virgin Islands with the United States Virgin Islands: 'Virgin Islands' should therefore not be used wherever there may be ambiguity.  The Islands have normally been called the British Virgin Islands since 1917 when the Danish West Indies were acquired by the United States and named the US Virgin Islands.
Dhekelia and Akrotiri are classed together as Sovereign Base Areas.

Country: Pitcairn, Henderson, Ducie and Oeno Islands
Official Name: Pitcairn, Henderson, Ducie and Oeno Islands
Notes: The term 'Pitcairn Islands' may be used in informal contexts.

Country: St Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
Official Name: St Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
Name for Citizen: St Helenian or Tristanian as appropriate. Ascension has no indigenous population
Adjectival Name: St Helenian/St Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha (as appropriate)
Notes: The territory of St Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha comprises St Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha (together with Gough, Inaccessible, Nightingale, Middle and Stoltenhoff Islands).

Country: South Georgia and South Sandwich Islands
Official Name: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
Name for Citizen: Inapplicable: no indigenous or permanent resident population
Adjectival Name: South Georgia, South Sandwich Islands (as appropriate)
